title: ‘Cookie-cutter’ care wasn’t best for new moms during COVID-19
content: The experiences of pregnant women and new mothers during COVID-19 sheds light on shortcomings of the one-size-fits-all approach to maternal care in the US.
description: The experiences of pregnant women and new mothers during COVID-19 sheds light on shortcomings of the one-size-fits-all approach to maternal care in the US.
